CustomField.description: Indicates the number of days after the "Are they referenceable yet?" notification is sent that the Reference Lead Status will be set to No Response. If no value is entered then the No Reponse date is left blank on the record.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicates the number of days after the "Are they referenceable yet?" notification is sent that the Reference Lead Status will be set to No Response. If no value is entered then the No Reponse date is left blank on the record.
CustomField.label: No Response Days
